name: Colorado Bankruptcy Training
tag_list: bankruptcy, attorney, education, training, law-firm, lawyer, paralegal, virtual-assistant, school, online-training
overview:
We provided training and support for Chapter 7 and 13 bankruptcy attorneys, their staff and legal professionals working under the direction of attorneys. We are also the developer of the first online school to provide skill training in preparing well-detailed bankruptcy petitions and following them through to confirmation or discharge.

The Problem Many Attorneys Face:

In law school, an attorney is taught bankruptcy law, normally oriented to Chapter 11s and business bankruptcy. The attorney is never taught how to filter bankruptcy clients, interpret client intake forms, conduct intake interviews, how to prepare Chapter 7 or Chapter 13 bankruptcy petitions or marketing their law practice.

If you are an attorney just starting a bankruptcy practice (or you want to change and update the one you already have), Colorado Bankruptcy Training and MyBankruptcySchool.Com provides services specifically to meet the needs and goals of your bankruptcy law firm.
